body_html:
@ezhulenev We are extending existing quantization ops like quantized_conv2d and quantized_avg_pool which are already part of the golden API. We needed this to support fusions in the offline graph transform/quantization tool. We cannot make it start with "_" because it won't be visible in the graph transform tool.
We do have equivalent _Mkl versions and at runtime the fused quantization ops get translated to _Mkl versions like other Mkl operators.

We do have equivalent _Mkl versions and at runtime the fused quantization ops get translated to _Mkl versions like other Mkl operators.
body:
@ezhulenev We are extending existing quantization ops like quantized_conv2d and quantized_avg_pool which are already part of the golden API. We needed this to support fusions in the offline graph transform/quantization tool. We cannot make it start with "_" because it won't be visible in the graph transform tool.
We do have equivalent _Mkl versions and at runtime the fused quantization ops get translated to _Mkl versions like other Mkl operators.
